document_data.caption: A map of the Shining Lands showing Heldapan on the north central shore of the Golden Water.
document_data.name: Heldapan
document_data.mainbody: '''Heldapan''' was the capital of [[Durpar]] located toward the center of the country.
document_data.Description:
Heldapan was situated on the eastern coast of the [[River Heldar]] near the [[Golden Water]].

Large docks were suited to handle the countless arrival of ships carrying goods.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Council of Merchants]] was based in Heldapan. Each of the [[Chakas of 31]] also had some kind of establishment here.
document_data.History: Heldapan was known throughout the [[Shining South]] for its splendid markets where nearly anything imaginable could be purchased.
